body_html: Yes what I mean is if that upstream "gerrit commits" merges are assimilable to a PR as conceptual description. If so probably you could use this concept in the merge description. I.e. many projects ask to squash commits on PRs before merging. But if that are sparse uncorrelated commit I think not description make sense.

body: Yes what I mean is if that upstream "gerrit commits" merges are assimilable to a PR as conceptual description. If so probably you could use this concept in the merge description. I.e. many projects ask to squash commits on PRs before merging. But if that are sparse uncorrelated commit I think not description make sense.
